mapper.select: select count(id) from quan_bao_li_record where fens_user_id = #{fensUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete = 0 and order_type in(1,2,20,3) and quan_id = #{quanId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_date desc

select
from quan_bao_li_record where create_date >= date(now()) and create_date < DATE_ADD(date(now()),INTERVAL 1 DAY) and is_delete = 0 and fens_user_id = #{fensUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from quan_bao_li_record where create_date >= (select create_date from quan_bao_li_record where fens_user_id = #{fensUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete = 0 order by create_date limit 1) and is_delete = 0 and fens_user_id in (select id from fens_user where referee_phone = #{refereePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete=0 and attachment='1') and quan_id = #{quanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from quan_bao_li_record where create_date >= (select create_date from quan_bao_li_record where fens_user_id = #{fensUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete = 0 order by create_date limit 1) and is_delete = 0 and order_type not in(1,2,20) and fens_user_id in (select id from fens_user where referee_phone = #{refereePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete=0 and attachment='1') and quan_id = #{quanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select sum(position) as position from quan_bao_li_record where create_date >= (select create_date from quan_bao_li_record where fens_user_id = #{fensUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete = 0 order by create_date limit 1) and is_delete = 0 and fens_user_id in (select id from fens_user where referee_phone = #{refereePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete=0 and attachment='1')

select
from quan_bao_li_record where create_date >='2018-07-13 06:00:00' and create_date <='2018-08-15 23:59:59' and is_delete = 0 and order_type not in(1,2,20)
